prompt: Create a minimalist analytics dashboard with an orange and white color scheme. Design a clean header with 'Business Insights' title and a menu hamburger icon. Display six small metric cards in a 3x2 grid layout showing 'Orders' (1,234), 'Revenue' (12,345), 'Customers' (567), 'Products' (89), 'Categories' (12), and 'Reviews' (2,345). Each card should have a subtle orange border, white background, and minimal icons. Below the grid, add a large rectangular chart area with orange accent colors and clean typography. Include a simple footer section with three action buttons: 'Export Data', 'Generate Report', and 'Schedule Email' with orange outlines.
